price: Lẹ́yìn náà, wọ́n sorí kọ́ (wọ́n sì wí pé): “Ìwọ náà kúkú mọ̀ pé àwọn wọ̀nyí kì í sọ̀rọ̀.”
arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُواْ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma nukisū ʿalā ruūsihim laqad ʿalim'ta mā hāulāi yanṭiqūna
